definition: weather-beaten/having experienced the hardships of life
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream

sentences.english: Her weather-beaten face tells of a hard life.
sentences.chinese: 她飽經風霜的臉說明艱苦的生活。

sentences.english: That good steel must be thoroughly tempered what strength can be more weather-beaten.
sentences.chinese: 千錘百煉才能夠磨鍊出好鋼，飽經風霜才能更強。

sentences.english: The man has the kind of face that had seen too much, a face much older than it ought to be.
sentences.chinese: 這個人的臉飽經風霜，比他實際年齡看上去老得多。
